titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Owburne in Buckinghamshire at the funerall of the right worshipfull, and truly religious gentlewoman, Mris Margaret Elmes On the twenty-seaventh of Iuly. 1641. By George Burches batchlour of divinity.
titleStmt.author: Burches, George, d. 1658.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
